ingredients: 1 pound briess wheat extract,7 pounds briess munich malt extract ,1 pound dingemans caramunich malt (grain milled for steeping), 1/2 once vanguard hops at 60 minutes,1/2 ounce fuggle uk hops at 20 minutes, 1 1/2 ounce tettenag hops at 5 minutes, and 1 pack of wyeast 1272 american ale 2.
name: Alchemist Ale
